summary: Inspiring  tomorrow's business and industrial leaders through creative and innovative educational programs, students personal interest, and working in a hands on maker environment. Students learn to offer disruptive solutions to real world problems as they master professional soft skills and develop their technical skills, creativity and entrepreneurial spirit to answer the challenges facing them.  Proactive advocate for student rights and student support. Introducing students to professional social networking and social networking etiquette. Helping students find and pursue their passions as they become lifelong learners.Blogger, entrepreneur, business owner, published author."I don't think of work as work and play as play.  It's all living."--Sir Richard Branson
